text: obata ovun pilituru nodunnahot niyata vasayenma ovun tamange sit (tula nægena) asavanma anugamanaya karannaha yayi sthira vasayen oba dæna ganu. allahge rju margaya hæra, tamange sit asavanma anugamanaya karannata vada durmargikayin kisiveku ho ætda? niyata vasayenma allah (mevæni) aparadhakara janatava rju margayehi ætulu karanne næta
